EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-07-12-Azure-Migration-Demo.July_Webinar-2018-07-11-AzureMigrationDemo-P
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Invitation | AI-Powered Migration Assessments for Azure
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-azure-migration-assessment/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
You are invited to join our Senior Director of Sales Engineering, Eric Horsman, as he demonstrates Turbonomic's AI-powered migration assessments for Azure on Thursday, July 12th at 11am ET. <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-azure-migration-assessment/]]>
In this 30-minute live demo session <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-azure-migration-assessment/]]>, you will learn how Turbomonic leverages an understanding of your entire stack - from the application to the hardware layer - to automatically generate a migration assessment that enables IT Teams to compare optimized costs in Azure and AWS.
See you there!
Regards, Andrew
